titleStmt.title: A relation from Portsmouth, vvherein is declared, the manner how the castle was taken on Saturday night last; as it was sent in a letter by one there present. Sep. 6, 1642. Likewise sixteen propositions, presented at the generall meeting of the gentry of the city of Gloucester, the 25. and 26. of August, 1642.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shop in Popes-head Ally,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
